name: 2022 The 2nd International Conference on Intelligent Technology and Embedded Systems
content: Proceedings: Accepted and presented full papers of ICITES 2022 will be published by conference proceedings. The proceedings will be submitted to EI Compendex and Scopus, etc. after the conference. SCI/Scopus Journals: Selected papers will be recommended to the following: Journal of Systems Architecture: Embedded Software Design (ISSN: 1383-7621) CCF B Indexing: SCI, Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. Journal of Circuits, Systems and Computers (ISSN: 0218-1266) Indexing: SCIE, Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. Journal of Electronic Science and Technology (ISSN: 1674-862X) Indexing: Scopus, INSPEC, CSCD, DOAJ etc., OA on ScienceDirect.
